title: Double exposure: Group portrait of groom, wearing moustache, light colored necktie, and light colored carnation on left lapel, standing with bride, wearing earrings and light colored satin short sleeve wedding dress with shrug collar and corsage on left shoulder, gathered behind table with light colored tablecloth, candles, and four tiered wedding cake, and group portrait of three men and three women standing in front of window with dark curtains, possibly on Monticello Street in Homewood Brushton
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
